channel.title: Help me!
channel.description: So from this thread you can tell I need help.... I really want to code servers make my own but I don't know were to start , I've watched every tutorial and I always go wrong somewhere , I want to grasp and understand how to create and know what I'm doing , can someone please put out a easy tutorial (I'm on windows 7) Or tell me what to do I'm kinda new to it thanks... If someone helps me greatly I will be willing to pay + rep thanks :) I also have team viewer and the server I want to have is one with dung no glitches or bugs good graphics and shops , if you can help thankyou !

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

  • Download a source with client (keep it to a 317 to start, no high revisions)
  • Make sure to have java jdk and jre isntalled.
  • Edit the java paths in the batch files to yours.
  • run the serba
    Once you can set up a server you can go start with easy things like adding things to a shop, spawning npc.
    Google and our search button will provide you all the tutorials and information you need.

Read full topic
